title: The secrets behind the Duchess of Cambridge's youthful hair makeover
text:
It's not just the Duchess of Cambridge's wardrobe that has seen an enviable revamp of late, this week she debuted her new honey blonde mane and we were struck by how youthful it has made her appear.

The Duchess has experimented over the year with her colour, "from reds to deep chocolates that have at times made her complexion a little flat and added harshness to her features," says GHD ambassador, Zoe Irwin. However, her recent foray into blonde has softened her and shaved off years. "The framing halo of light tones around her face work like a skin smoothing, and illuminating light ring, eliminating dark shadows that can make lines look deeper and dark circles around the eyes more pronounced,"...
description: It's not just the Duchess of Cambridge's wardrobe that has seen an enviable revamp of late, this week she debuted her new honey blonde mane and we were struck by how youthful it has made her appear.
